Text: Waiting impatiently for the qualifying! Thank you so much for your uploads! People around the world must be very grateful.

^Why are you waiting for footy to upload race torrents? 

These two profiles upload every session 4 hours before footy. Check the dates and times of their uploads. Footy uploads the same torrents as them just 4 hours late.

http://thepiratebay.sx/user/tonyisaac/

^Oh don't get me wrong mate I love footy as well. Just trying to help people out who want the race fast.
